data.meta_description:
Divyanka Tripathi, Sanaya Irani, Surbhi Jyoti- 5 best Instagram posts of TV actors this week- view pics! - We take a look at some of the most happening pics posted by our leading Television stars. Check em' out!
Much like Twitter and Facebook, Instagram …
data.text:
We take a look at some of the most happening pics posted by our leading Television stars. Check em' out!

Much like Twitter and Facebook, Instagram has now become a big deal. The photo sharing app is a hit with the masses as well as celebrities. Leading stars of B-town as well as Television, often keep their fans updated about what they are doing, where they are going, whom they are with, so on and so forth. BollywoodLife every week picks out the best Instagram photos put forth by our celebs. This week's photo feature includes the likes of Surbhi Jyoti, Divyanka Tripathi and Sriti Jha. Check out the top 7 celebrity Instagram posts of TV actors:

Meet Mahira Akhtar

Qubool Hai's leading actress Surbhi Jyoti posted this picture on her Instagram account. This is the beauty's new geeky avatar in the show and she goes by the name Mahira Akhtar. Lol, check out those braces and the piggytails. I've gotta say, I find her very cute and have started liking her more than Sanam!

Happy birthday rockstar!

Kumkum Bhagya's Shabbir Ahluwalia, who plays a rockstar Abhi in the series, recently celebrated his birthday and got this cute photo dedication from his co-star Sristi Jha aka Pragya! The two's chemistry on-screen is quite happening and looks like the two share a comfortable rapport off it as well. Just look at them posing like gangstas in this one!

Baby ka hai birthday bash

Karan Patel's better half Ankita Bhargava's birthday was an epic one as all her besies were present for the lay of the hour. Ankita shares a great rapport with her hubby Karan's Yeh Hai Mohabbatein co-stars Divyanka Tripathi and Anita Hassanandani. The team is seen partying together and by the looks of this picture, it looks like they had a great time.

Baby love

Kaisi Yeh Yaariyan's Niti Taylor recently posted a picture of her niece on her Instagram account. I find this pic too cute for words! Now that the first season of the show has seen a wrap, I bet Niti will be spending a lot more time with this little one.

Charlie vs Charlie

Sanaya Irani posted this pic on her Instagram account recently where she is seen dressed like Charlie Chaplin along with her choreographer. I'm certain her act on Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa Reloaded will be a fun watch!

Which TV actor's Instagram post did you like the most? Let me know in the comments section below!

Stay tuned to BollywoodLife for the latest scoops and updates from Bollywood, Hollywood, South, TV and Web-Series.
